title: Assuli 2015 Astolfo Grillo (Terre Siciliane)
description: Aromas of oak, underbrush and a whiff of wet stone lift out of the glass. The aromas carry over to the lean palate along with ripe yellow-apple skin, a hint of citrus zest and a saline note. It closes on a bitter nutty note.

title: Board Track Racer 2015 The Vincent White Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: Aromas of pear, lees, herb and spice lead to a medium-bodied palate. Some bitter notes provide a bit of distraction.

title: Vignerons de Tutiac 2016 Lalande Bellevue  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: Crisp and packed with acidity, this wine needs time to soften and fill out. Hints of riper fruits lie underneath, and also a touch of perfume. Drink from late 2017.

title: Casto Oaks 2014 Syrah Port (Sierra Foothills)
description: Ripe and sweet blackberry jam and dried fig flavors fill out this Port-style sweet wine. Good doses of tannin and acidity keep it structured enough to not feel cloying, lending a little textural grip.

title: Catman 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Willamette Valley)
description: Sharp-edged aromas show classic notes of grass and fresh asparagus. In the mouth, it pulls the fruit forward: there are lightly honeyed flavors of melon and peach with a slightly sugary, short finish.

title: Cave de Hunawihr 2016 Pinot Noir (Alsace)
description: This is a very easy light-bodied red for chilling. The body is dry, slender and fresh. The flavor expression is of red fruit, earth and apple skin. It has a rustic, picnic-style quality. Drink soon.

title: Château de Bonhoste 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
description: This wine is spicy, fruity and packed with herbal and lemon flavors. It will soon be a refreshing wine, lively and with swathes of acidity. Drink from late summer 2017.

title: Château Larrivet Haut-Brion 2016 Le Bordeaux de Larrivet Haut-Brion Blanc  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: This wine from Maison Ginestet is all crisp, green fruit. Light and bright, it bursts with acidity and perfumed fruitiness. Drink now.
designation: Le Bordeaux de Larrivet Haut-Brion Blanc

title: Château le Grand Verdus 2016 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: Light and bright, this is a perfumed wine. Its very present acidity is underpinned by spice, red-currant fruits and a tangy, tangerine aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Château Panchille 2016 Blanc de Fernand  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: Pascal Sirat named this wine for his father and his son. Bright and fruity, it is already deliciously light, refreshing and bright. Acidity jumps out of the glass, giving a crisp, fresh character. The aftertaste is more taut and tense. Drink now.

title: Château Suau 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
description: From vineyards on the slope above Cadillac, this is a tight, mineral-textured wine. With crisp lemon flavors, it is brightly lit with acidity and clean fruitiness. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Viña Tabalí 2014 Vetas Blancas Reserva Especial Pinot Noir (Limarí Valley)
description: Leafy cherry and tire-rubber aromas fairly represent the variety. This Limarí Pinot feels chunky and medium full in body, but fresh. Salty rubbery plum flavors finish about the same, with a hint of residual salt.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Companhia das Lezirias Tyto Alba Rosé (Tejo)
description: A light fragrant blend of Touriga Nacional and Tinta Cão, the wine is soft with plenty of strawberry fruitiness and acidity. The aftertaste has a great lift of perfumed crispness.

title: Zero One Vintners 2015 Copper Lily Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: The aromas in this wine are light, with notes of herb, citrus and orange peel. The palate is dry and broad, with tart citrus flavors. Although appealing, it seems a bit generic.

title: Château La Rame 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
description: This is a warm wine, ripe and with hints of yellow fruits as well as crisper acidity. Poised between herbal and riper flavors, it's ready to drink now.

title: Viña Casablanca 2016 Cefiro Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
description: Dusty gritty citrus aromas are briny and piercing. This feels honest and solid, but cutting. Grassy flavors blend with lean citrus notes prior to a basic short finish.

title: Tenute Orestiadi 2016 Molino a Vento Rosato (Terre Siciliane)
description: Fruity and fresh, this has aromas of red berry and pomegranate. The scents flow through to the easygoing palate along with raspberry and bright acidity.

title: Schuchmann Wines 2015 Compass Rosé (Kakheti)
description: Deep blush in the glass, this wine has aromas of white peach and rose petal. It is full in the mouth, with flavors of nectarine, clementine and lavender. Soft floral notes enhance the bright finish.

title: Sculpterra 2014 Heroe Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description: This is a great project dedicated to and featuring the winery's workers, who are named on the bottles, although the wine itself is a tad sweet. Baked black cherry, licorice and caramel aromas lead to a palate ripe with purple berry and cocoa dust flavors. An easy to quaff and light-bodied red.

title: Simi 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma County)
description: Grass and apricot scents define the nose of this lively, refreshing wine—a simple study in vanilla and ripely sweetened peach that was fermented entirely in stainless steel tanks.

title: Pradorey 2011 PR3 Barricas Verdejo (Rueda)
description: Bold yellow-gold in color, this aged, barrel-fermented Verdejo has predictably heavy aromas of wood spice and resin, joined by hints of carrot juice and apricot. It has solid palate with adequate acidity, showing oaky stone fruit flavors that finish with a heavy dose of barrel spice.

title: Quinta da Lixa 2016 Aromas das Castas Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)
description: Half-and-half Alvarinho and Trajadura, the wine is dry, crisp and with just a touch of fizz. Grapefruit and lemon flavors mingle with softer apples to give a bright and lively wine that is just made for summer food. Drink now.

title: Baily 2016 Chardonnay (Temecula Valley)
description: This wine has an unctuous nose that shows jasmine, plumeria, coconut and ripe apple scents most prominently. Ripe mango, coconut and banana touches show on the palate, which is clean but quite tropical.

title: Château Roquefort 2016 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: With just a hint of a pink color, this is a crisp and fruity wine. Citrus, tangerine and lemon flavors carry a light touch of red currants. Drink this bright wine now.

title: Château Tassin 2016 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: Soft, ripe and fruity, this lightly spicy wine is full of red fruits and crisp acidity. It balances between the fruit and the tangy, textured aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Cheval Quancard 2016 Cuvée Clémence  (Entre-Deux-Mers)
description: This is a spicy, herbal wine. Its crisp lemon flavor is lifted by perfumed Muscadelle in the blend to give a wine that has a warm edge to balance the acidity. It is ready to drink.

title: Craftsman 2015 Chardonnay (California)
description: Very fruity, ripe-tasting and rounded, this medium-bodied wine is easy to swallow due to its low acidity and soft texture. Hints of butter and nutmeg add to the fresh apple flavors.

title: Crux 2015 Viognier (Russian River Valley)
description: Blended with a splash of Grenache Blanc, this white is floral, viscous and full of a nutty character. It's the first vintage in which the producer has included grapes from Catie's Corner.

title: Cuyen 2016 Carmenère (Central Valley)
description: Cherry, cassis, tomato sauce and crushed leaves are the aromas on this rubbery-feeling Carmenère. Spiced cherry flavors don't show much depth or complexity, while this feels dry and tastes lightly oaky on the finish.

title: Cave de Turckheim 2016 Pinot Noir Rosé (Alsace)
description: Pear drop and strawberry make for a fresh inviting nose. The palate is slightly dilute but very fresh and lively with some residual carbon dioxide. This is light and dry. Drink while aromas are fresh.
